trans-unit.source: The response will return a list of cookbooks by name and description and will return a list of cookbooks that match the search query. Each returned data set will include the name of the cookbook, a description, the URI, and the name of the individual who maintains the cookbook. In addition, the total number of cookbooks on Supermarket API is shown, as well (if start is specified) the point at which the list of returned cookbooks began:
trans-unit.target: 响应将按名称和描述返回菜谱列表，并返回与搜索查询匹配的菜谱列表。每个返回的数据集将包括菜谱的名称，描述，URI和维护菜谱的个人的名称。此外，还会显示Supermarket API上食谱的总数，以及（如果指定了 start ）返回的食谱列表开始的时间点：

trans-unit.source: The response will return a list of cookbooks that are required by the run_list array contained in the request. Depending on any constraints present in the request or on dependencies a cookbook may have for specific cookbook versions, a request may not always return the latest cookbook version for each cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 响应将返回请求中包含的 run_list 数组所需的食谱列表。返回的食谱通常是每个食谱的最新版本。取决于请求中存在的任何约束或菜谱对特定菜谱版本的依赖关系，请求可能不会总是为每个菜谱返回最新的菜谱版本。

trans-unit.source: The same broken change is made to project A, which causes project B’s tests to fail. This time, instead of changing project A, project B is updated instead to use the new API. That worked, but the change in project B inadvertently broke project D during testing. Now, none of projects A through D can ship. It might look like project A should be able to ship as it isn’t broken, and neither are the projects which depend on it; however, to ship this version of project A, a new version of project B would have to ship, which would cause project D to break in production.
trans-unit.target: 对项目A进行了相同的重大更改，这导致项目B的测试失败。这次，没有更改项目A，而是更新了项目B，以使用新的API。那行得通，但是项目B的更改在测试过程中无意中破坏了项目D。现在，项目A到D都无法交付。看起来项目A应该能够交付，因为它没有损坏，也不依赖于它。但是，要发布此版本的项目A，必须发布新版本的项目B，这将导致项目D的生产中断。

trans-unit.source: The second reason is that Union, Rehearsal, and Delivered form the shared pipeline. In these stages you evaluate a change in the context of your system as a whole. Ultimately, it is the health of the entire system—not a particular application—that matters. The Union stage gives you a place to evaluate the impact of a change on the consumers of the application being shipped. Each stage in the shared pipeline has the same set of phases: provision, deploy, smoke, and functional.
trans-unit.target: 第二个原因是联合，排练和已交付构成了共享管道。在这些阶段中，您将评估整个系统环境的变化。最终，重要的是整个系统（而不是特定应用程序）的运行状况。Union阶段为您提供了一个评估更改对所交付应用程序使用者的影响的场所。共享管道中的每个阶段都有相同的阶段集：供应，部署，使用和运行。

trans-unit.source: The second reason is that Union, Rehearsal, and Delivered form the shared pipeline. In these stages you evaluate a change in the context of your system as a whole. Ultimately, it is the health of the entire system-not a particular application-that matters. The Union stage gives you a place to evaluate the impact of a change on the consumers of the application being shipped. Each stage in the shared pipeline has the same set of phases: provision, deploy, smoke, and functional.
trans-unit.target: 第二个原因是,联合、排练和交付形成了共享管道。在这些阶段,你要在整个系统的背景下评估一个变化。最终,重要的是整个系统的健康状况,而不是某个特定的应用程序。联合阶段为您提供了一个地方,以评估更改对正在运送的应用程序的消费者的影响。共享管道中的每个阶段都有相同的一组阶段:供应、部署、烟雾和功能。

trans-unit.source: The set of fields to preserve when crossSeriesReducer is specified. The groupByFields determine how the time series are partitioned into subsets prior to applying the aggregation function. Each subset contains time series that have the same value for each of the grouping fields. Each individual time series is a member of exactly one subset. The crossSeriesReducer is applied to each subset of time series. It is not possible to reduce across different resource types, so this field implicitly contains resource.type. Fields not specified in groupByFields are aggregated away. If groupByFields is not specified and all the time series have the same resource type, then the time series are aggregated into a single output time series. If crossSeriesReducer is not defined, this field is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 指定crossSeriesReducer时要保留的字段集。groupByFields决定了在应用聚合函数之前如何将时间序列分割成子集。每个子集都包含对每个分组字段具有相同值的时间序列。每个单独的时间序列正好是一个子集的成员。crossSeriesReducer应用于每个时间序列的子集。不可能跨不同的资源类型进行还原,所以这个字段隐式地包含 resource.type。没有在groupByFields中指定的字段会被聚合掉。如果没有指定groupByFields,并且所有的时间序列都具有相同的资源类型,那么时间序列将被聚合成一个单一的输出时间序列。如果没有定义crossSeriesReducer,这个字段将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The set of labels that can be used to describe a specific instance of this metric type. trans-unit.source: The solution eventually adopted in Chef Infra Client 16.2 was to require all resources to declare a provides lines, and to make the resource_name setting only affect the display output. As a result, any cookbook which declares a resource with only a resource_name needs to add a provides line for Chef Infra Client 16. While this is more disruptive to users it is simple, it can be autocorrected via static analysis, and it results in a much simpler end state where the resource_name is just a display name and the provides statement is solely responsible for how the resource is addressed in recipe mode.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client 16.2最终采用的解决方案是要求所有资源声明一个 provides 行，并使 resource_name 设置仅影响显示输出。结果，任何声明仅具有 resource_name 资源的菜谱都需要为Chef Infra Client 16添加一个 provides 行。尽管这对用户更具破坏性，但它很简单，可以通过静态分析进行自动更正，并导致更为简单的最终状态，其中 resource_name 只是一个显示名称， provides 语句仅负责如何在配方模式下寻址资源。

trans-unit.source: The staging directory is a local directory that will be used for temporarily storing the backup archive, database dump, and configuration data during the backup procedure. When left unconfigured, the Ruby temporary directory will be used. The Ruby temporary directory is usually nested in /tmp on Linux systems, but the value of the TMPDIR environment variable will also be honored. You can configure the staging directory by using the backup['staging_dir'] setting in delivery.rb.

trans-unit.source: The supermarket.rb file contains all of the non-default configuration settings used by the Chef Supermarket. The default settings are built-in to the Chef Supermarket configuration, and should only be added to the supermarket.rb file to apply non-default values. These configuration settings are processed when the supermarket-ctl reconfigure command is run. The supermarket.rb file is a Ruby file, which means that conditional statements can be used in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 超级市场.rb文件包含Chef超级市场使用的所有非默认配置设置。默认设置内置于Chef Supermarket配置中，并且仅应将其添加到超级市场.rb文件中以应用非默认值。运行 supermarket-ctl reconfigure 命令时，将处理这些配置设置。超级市场.rb文件是一个Ruby文件，这意味着可以在配置文件中使用条件语句。

trans-unit.source: The supervisor for Chef Supermarket is configured to restart any service that fails, unless that service has been asked to change its state. The once subcommand is used to tell the supervisor to not attempt to restart any service that fails.
trans-unit.target: Chef Supermarket的主管配置为重新启动任何失败的服务，除非已要求该服务更改其状态。“ once ”子命令用于告诉主管不要尝试重新启动任何失败的服务。

trans-unit.source: The supervisor for Chef Supermarket is configured to wait seven seconds for a service to respond to a command from the supervisor. If you see output that references a timeout, it means that a signal has been sent to the process, but that the process has yet to actually comply. In general, processes that have timed out are not a big concern, unless they are failing to respond to the signals at all. If a process is not responding, use a command like the kill subcommand to stop the process, investigate the cause (if required), and then use the start subcommand to re-enable it.
trans-unit.target: Chef Supermarket的主管配置为等待七秒钟，以使服务响应主管的命令。如果您看到引用超时的输出，则表示已将信号发送到流程，但是该流程尚未真正符合要求。一般而言，已超时的过程不是什么大问题，除非它们根本无法响应信号。如果某个进程没有响应，请使用 kill 子命令之类的命令停止该进程，调查原因（如果需要），然后使用 start 子命令重新启用它。

trans-unit.source: The target CPU utilization that the autoscaler should maintain. Must be a float value in the range (0, 1]. If not specified, the default is 0.6. If the CPU level is below the target utilization, the autoscaler scales down the number of instances until it reaches the minimum number of instances you specified or until the average CPU of your instances reaches the target utilization. If the average CPU is above the target utilization, the autoscaler scales up until it reaches the maximum number of instances you specified or until the average utilization reaches the target utilization.
trans-unit.target: 自動計數器應維持的目標CPU使用率。必须是范围(0,1]的浮动值。如果没有指定,默认为0.6。如果CPU水平低于目标利用率,自动oscaler会减少实例数量,直到达到你指定的最小实例数量,或者直到实例的平均CPU达到目标利用率。如果平均CPU水平高于目标利用率,则自动缩放器会放大实例数量,直到达到你指定的最大实例数量,或者直到平均利用率达到目标利用率。

trans-unit.source: The target audience for Chef Desktop are administrators with limited command-line or tools experience. Our goal is to create a work pattern that leads you to explore the Chef Infra Client from the command line on your own. The instructions for the Chef Desktop pattern should guide you from starting from scratch to managing your fleet in less than a day.
trans-unit.target: Chef Desktop的目标受众是具有有限命令行或工具经验的管理员。我们的目标是创建一个工作模式,引导您自己从命令行探索Chef Infra Client。Chef Desktop模式的说明应该引导您在一天之内从零开始到管理您的车队。

trans-unit.source: The target value of the metric that autoscaler should maintain. This must be a positive value. A utilization metric scales number of virtual machines handling requests to increase or decrease proportionally to the metric. For example, a good metric to use as a utilizationTarget is www.googleapis.com/compute/instance/network/received_bytes_count. The autoscaler will work to keep this value constant for each of the instances.
trans-unit.target: 自动定标器应保持的指标目标值。这必须是一个正值。利用率度量标准可缩放处理请求的虚拟机数量，以与该度量标准成比例地增加或减少。例如，用作www.googleapis.com/compute/instance/network/received_bytes_count的一个很好的衡量指标。自动定标器将为每个实例保持此值恒定。

trans-unit.source: The target value of the metric that autoscaler should maintain. This must be a positive value. A utilization metric scales number of virtual machines handling requests to increase or decrease proportionally to the metric. For example, a good metric to use as a utilizationTarget is www.googleapis.com/compute/instance/network/received_bytes_count. The autoscaler will work to keep this value constant for each of the instances.
trans-unit.target: 自动定标器应保持的指标目标值。这必须是一个正值。利用率度量标准可缩放处理请求的虚拟机数量，以与该度量标准成比例地增加或减少。例如，用作利用率目标的一个很好的指标是www.googleapis.com/compute/instance/network/received_bytes_count。自动定标器将为每个实例保持此值恒定。

trans-unit.source: The tests within each stage are organized into phases. The stages and the phases are fixed for all pipelines in Chef Automate. However, what happens within any given phase is completely up to you—if you can describe the activity in a Chef recipe, then you can make it happen in a phase.
trans-unit.target: 每个阶段中的测试均分为多个阶段。Chef Automate中所有管道的阶段和阶段都是固定的。但是，在任何给定阶段中发生的事情完全取决于您-如果您可以在Chef食谱中描述活动，则可以使其在一个阶段中发生。

trans-unit.source: The tests within each stage are organized into phases. The stages and the phases are fixed for all pipelines in Workflow. However, what happens within any given phase is completely up to you—if you can describe the activity in a Chef recipe, then you can make it happen in a phase.
trans-unit.target: 每个阶段中的测试均分为多个阶段。工作流程中所有管道的阶段和阶段都是固定的。但是，在任何给定阶段中发生的事情完全取决于您-如果您可以在Chef食谱中描述活动，则可以使其在一个阶段中发生。

trans-unit.source: The time between retries will double maxDoublings times. A job’s retry interval starts at minBackoffDuration, then doubles maxDoublings times, then increases linearly, and finally retries retries at intervals of maxBackoffDuration up to retryCount times.
trans-unit.target: 重试之间的时间将是maxDoublings时间的两倍。作业的重试间隔从minBackoffDuration开始，然后将maxDoublings时间加倍，然后线性增加，最后以maxBackoffDuration的间隔重试重试，直到retryCount次。

trans-unit.source: The time from which the retention policy was effective

trans-unit.source: The time it took to service the request.
trans-unit.target: 服务请求所需的时间。

trans-unit.source: The time limit for retrying a failed job, measured from time when an execution was first attempted. If specified with retryCount, the job will be retried until both limits are reached. A duration in seconds with up to nine fractional digits, terminated by ’s'.
trans-unit.target: 重试失败的作业的时间限制，从首次尝试执行时开始计算。如果使用retryCount指定，将重试作业，直到达到两个限制。持续时间（以秒为单位），最多9个小数位，以's'结尾。

trans-unit.source: The universe is the known collection of cookbooks that have been uploaded to Chef Supermarket. trans-unit.source: The update command will make any changes necessary to start the new service and verify that the updated node has rejoined the cluster.

trans-unit.source: The upgrade process backs up your Chef Automate 1 data, shuts down Chef Automate 1, imports your data to Chef Automate 2, then starts Chef Automate 2. At this point, you can use your existing Chef Automate 1 user credentials to login to Chef Automate 2. If you’ve been using LDAP for authenticating users, that configuration will have been migrated as well, and you can use your LDAP credentials to login. Historical data will be migrated in the background.
trans-unit.target: 升级过程将备份Chef Automate 1数据，关闭Chef Automate 1，将数据导入Chef Automate 2，然后启动Chef Automate2。此时，您可以使用现有的Chef Automate 1用户凭据登录到Chef Automate。 2.如果您一直使用LDAP对用户进行身份验证，那么该配置也将被迁移，并且您可以使用LDAP凭据登录。历史数据将在后台迁移。

trans-unit.source: The upgrade process will automatically assign the organization name to the default_orgname setting in the chef-server.rb file. This setting ensures the new organization name is available for Chef server API requests, such as those made by the chef-client and by knife.
trans-unit.target: 升级过程将自动将组织名称分配给Chef-server.rb文件中的 default_orgname 设置。此设置可确保新的组织名称可用于Chef服务器API请求，例如Chef客户端和小刀发出的请求。

trans-unit.source: The upgrade process will automatically detect the presence of Open Source Chef 11, and will step through the migration process, prompting for organization name details along the way.
trans-unit.target: 升级过程中会自动检测到开源Chef 11的存在,并逐步完成迁移过程,途中会提示组织名称的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The user Workflow will use to perform LDAP searches. This is often the administrator or manager user. This user needs to have read access to all LDAP users that require authentication. The Workflow server must do an LDAP search before any user can log in. Many LDAP systems do not allow an anonymous bind. If anonymous bind is allowed, leave the bind_dn and bind_dn_password settings blank. If anonymous bind is not allowed, a user with READ access to the directory is required. This user must be specified as an LDAP distinguished name (dn). Default value: nil.
trans-unit.target: 用户工作流将用于执行LDAP搜索。这通常是管理员或管理员用户。该用户需要对所有需要身份验证的LDAP用户具有读取权限。在任何用户都可以登录之前，Workflow服务器必须进行LDAP搜索。许多LDAP系统不允许匿名绑定。如果允许匿名绑定，请将 bind_dn 和 bind_dn_password 设置保留为空白。如果不允许匿名绑定，则需要具有对该目录的 READ 访问权限的用户。必须将此用户指定为LDAP专有名称（ dn ）。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The user account that the systemd unit process is run under. The path to the unit for that user would be something like ‘/etc/systemd/user/sshd.service’. trans-unit.source: The user name of the user identity with which to launch the new process. Default value: nil. The user name may optionally be specified with a domain, i.e. domainuser or user@my.dns.domain.com via Universal Principal Name (UPN)format. It can also be specified without a domain simply as user if the domain is instead specified using the domain attribute. On Windows only, if this property is specified, the password property must be specified.

trans-unit.target: 项目的用户指定显示名称。它必须是4到30个字符。允许使用的字符有:小写和大写字母、数字、连字符、单引号、双引号、空格和感叹号。

trans-unit.source: The user-supplied identifier of the cluster. This identifier is a unique key that identifies a cluster.

trans-unit.source: The username and password of a Bitbucket user to use as the service account. This user must have full access (read/write) to the projects you wish to add to Workflow
trans-unit.target: Bitbucket用户作为服务账户的用户名和密码。这个用户必须对你想添加到工作流的项目有完全的访问权(读/写)。

trans-unit.source: The username for the delivery services user. Default value: "delivery".
trans-unit.target: 交付服务用户的用户名。默认值： "delivery" 。

trans-unit.source: The username for the replication connection.
trans-unit.target: 复制连接的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The username provided must be a user who has sudo access on the remote node. If the user is a member of a domain, then the username value should be entered as user@domain.
trans-unit.target: 提供的用户名必须是在远程节点上具有sudo访问权限的用户。如果用户是域的成员，则用户名值应输入为 user@domain 。

trans-unit.source: The username that Chef Automate will use if you have Elasticsearch X-Pack Basic Authentication enabled on your Elasticsearch cluster. Default value: nil.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Elasticsearch集群上启用了Elasticsearch X-Pack基本身份验证，Chef Automate将使用的用户名。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The username to authenticate feeds.

trans-unit.source: The username to use for HTTP basic authentication to the master endpoint.

trans-unit.target: 用于验证测试实例的用户名。对于 winrm 传输，默认为 administrator ，对于 ssh 传输，默认为 root 。某些驱动程序可能会更改此默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The usernames of the returned Users.

trans-unit.source: The value of the internet_gateway_id assigned by the AWS after the resource has been created. This should be in the format of igw- followed by 8 or 17 hexadecimal characters and passed as an id: 'value' key-value entry in a hash.
trans-unit.target: 创建资源后，AWS分配的 internet_gateway_id 的值。该格式应为 igw- ,后接8或17个十六进制字符，并作为 id: 'value' 传递：哈希中的“值”键值条目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the nat_gateway_id assigned by the AWS after the resource has been created. This should be in the format of nat- followed by 8 or 17 hexadecimal characters and passed as an id: 'value' key-value entry in a hash.
trans-unit.target: 创建资源后，AWS分配的 nat_gateway_id 的值。该格式应为 nat- 格式，后接8或17个十六进制字符，并作为 id: 'value' 传递：哈希中的“值”键值条目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the repository_name can be provided as a string.
trans-unit.target: 可以以字符串形式提供 repository_name 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the revision attribute may change over time. From one branch to another, to a tag, to a specific SHA for a commit, and then back to a branch. The revision attribute may even be changed in a way where history gets rewritten.
trans-unit.target: revision 属性的值可能会随时间变化。从一个分支到另一个分支，再到一个标记，再到一个特定的SHA进行提交，然后再回到一个分支。该 revision 属性甚至可以在历史被改写的方式来改变。

trans-unit.source: The value of the creation token.
trans-unit.target: 创建令牌的价值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the environmental variable to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的环境变量的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the field must be in [0, 1]. If the ratio of the healthy VMs in the primary backend is at or below this number, traffic arriving at the load-balanced IP will be directed to the failover backend. In case where ‘failoverRatio’ is not set or all the VMs in the backup backend are unhealthy, the traffic will be directed back to the primary backend in the “force” mode, where traffic will be spread to the healthy VMs with the best effort, or to all VMs when no VM is healthy. This field is only used with l4 load balancing.
trans-unit.target: 该字段的值必须在[0，1]中。如果主后端中正常运行的VM的比率等于或小于此数字，则到达负载平衡IP的流量将被定向到故障转移后端。如果未设置“ failoverRatio”或备份后端中的所有虚拟机都不正常，则将以“强制”模式将流量定向回主要后端，在此情况下，流量将尽最大努力分散到正常的虚拟机中。 ，或者在所有虚拟机都没有运行正常的情况下访问所有虚拟机。该字段仅与l4负载平衡一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The value of the flag. Booleans should be set to on for true and off for false. This field must be omitted if the flag doesn’t take a value.
trans-unit.target: 标志的值。布尔值应设置为on表示true，而布尔值则设置为false。如果该标志没有值，则必须省略此字段。

trans-unit.source: The value of the host header in the HTTP health check request. If left empty (default value), the public IP on behalf of which this health check is performed will be used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP健康检查请求中的主机头的值,如果留空(默认值),将使用代表该健康检查的公共IP。如果留空(默认值),将使用代表该健康检查的公共IP。

trans-unit.source: The value of the host header in the HTTP2 health check request. If left empty (default value), the public IP on behalf of which this health check is performed will be used.

trans-unit.source: The value of the host header in the HTTPS health check request. If left empty (default value), the public IP on behalf of which this health check is performed will be used.

trans-unit.source: The value of the key. Note: With the type property set to bool, String forms of Boolean true/false values that Apple accepts in the defaults command will be coerced: 0/1, ‘TRUE’/‘FALSE,’ ‘true’/false', ‘YES’/‘NO’, or ‘yes’/‘no’.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的值。注意：使用 type 属性设置为 bool ， String 布尔真/假值的形式，苹果在默认命令接受将被强制：0/1，“TRUE” /“假”，“真” /假“” YES '/'否'或'是'/'否'。

trans-unit.source: The version of the package to be installed. A version always takes the form x.y.z, where x, y, and z are decimal numbers that are used to represent major (x), minor (y), and patch (z) versions. A two-part version (x.y) is also allowed. For more information about application versioning, see https://semver.org/.
trans-unit.target: 要安装的软件包的版本。版本始终采用xyz的形式，其中x，y和z是十进制数字，用于表示主要（x），次要（y）和补丁（z）版本。也允许使用两部分版本（xy）。有关应用程序版本控制的更多信息，请参见https://semver.org/。

trans-unit.source: There are four shortcodes that can be combined together to create a container that will allow the user to click on a tab to reveal content in a matching panel. For example, you may want to display matching Ruby and YAML code blocks. You can create two tabs, one titled Ruby and the other YAML, and the user could click on one tab to show the Ruby code block and another tab to show the YAML code block. See the example below.

trans-unit.source: There are many ways to go wrong writing library providers. One of the biggest issues is that internal Chef Infra Client code superficially looks like a library provider, but it is not. Chef internal resources do not inherit from LWRPBase and we’ve had to manually create resources directly through Chef::Resource::File.new(), we also have not been able to use_inline_resources and not had access to other niceties that cookbook authors have had access to for years now. We’ve got some modernization of internal Chef cookbook code now and resources like apt_update and apt_repository in core have started to be written more like cookbook code should be written, but core resources are actually behind the curve and are bad code examples.
trans-unit.target: 编写库提供程序有很多错误的方法。最大的问题之一是内部Chef Infra Client代码表面上看起来像是库提供程序，但事实并非如此。Chef的内部资源不会继承自 LWRPBase ，我们不得不直接通过 Chef::Resource::File.new() 手动创建资源，我们也无法使用 use_inline_resources ，也无法访问食谱作者拥有的其他功能已经访问了多年。现在，我们对内部Chef Cookbook代码和 apt_update 和 apt_repository 等资源进行了现代化 已经开始像编写菜谱代码那样开始编写core中的代码，但是核心资源实际上落后了，并且是不好的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: These patterns return the computed value of the key being deleted for the specified precedence level.
trans-unit.target: 这些模式返回被删除的键在指定优先级的计算值。

trans-unit.source: These permissions are cumulative. If :write is specified, then it includes :read. If :full_control is specified, then it includes both :write and :read.
trans-unit.target: 这些权限是累积的。如果指定了 :write ，则包括 :read 。如果指定 :full_control ，则它同时包括 :write 和 :read 。

trans-unit.source: These permissions set the default permissions for the following Chef Infra Server object types: clients, cookbooks, data bags, environments, groups, nodes, roles, and sandboxes.
trans-unit.target: 这些权限为以下Chef Infra Server对象类型设置了默认权限:客户端、cookbook、数据袋、环境、组、节点、角色和沙箱。

trans-unit.source: These permissions set the default permissions for the following Chef server object types: clients, cookbooks, data bags, environments, groups, nodes, roles, and sandboxes.
trans-unit.target: 这些权限为以下Chef服务器对象类型设置了默认权限:客户端、cookbook、数据袋、环境、组、节点、角色和沙箱。

trans-unit.source: These policies are discussed in more detail in Project Policies.
trans-unit.target: 这些策略在“项目策略”中有更详细的讨论。

trans-unit.source: These products are typically installed on a user’s workstation. Two methods are generally used to accept the license for these products:
trans-unit.target: 这些产品通常安装在用户的工作站上。通常使用两种方法来接受这些产品的许可证：

trans-unit.source: These products install or manage Chef on a remote instance. If a user has accepted the appropriate product license locally, it will be automatically transferred to the remote instance. For example, if a user has accepted the Chef Infra Client license locally and converges a Test Kitchen instance with the Chef provisioner, it will succeed by copying the acceptance to the remote instance. We aim to support this behavior, so Workstation users do not have their workflow affected, but any differences from that behavior are documented below.
trans-unit.target: 这些产品在远程实例上安装或管理Chef。如果用户已经在本地接受了相应的产品许可证,它将自动转移到远程实例。例如,如果用户在本地接受了 Chef Infra Client 许可证,并将 Test Kitchen 实例与 Chef 配置程序进行了融合,那么它将通过将接受的内容复制到远程实例来成功。我们的目标是支持这种行为,因此工作站用户的工作流程不会受到影响,但与这种行为的任何差异都会在下面进行记录。

trans-unit.source: These properties are defined as variables in the httpd.conf.erb file. A template block in recipes will tell Chef Infra Client how to apply these variables.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性在 httpd.conf.erb 文件中定义为变量。一个模板在配方块会告诉厨师红外客户如何运用这些变量。

trans-unit.source: These properties are defined as variables in the httpd.conf.erb file. A template block in recipes will tell the chef-client how to apply these variables.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性在 httpd.conf.erb 文件中定义为变量。一个模板在配方块会告诉厨师客户如何运用这些变量。

trans-unit.source: These properties are not always available. For example, a start handler runs at the beginning of Chef Infra Client run, which means that properties like end_time and elapsed_time are still unknown and will be unavailable to the run_status object.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性并非始终可用。例如，启动处理程序在Chef Infra Client运行开始时运行，这意味着诸如 end_time 和 elapsed_time 之类的属性仍是未知的，并且对于 run_status 对象不可用。

trans-unit.source: These properties are not always available. For example, a start handler runs at the beginning of the chef-client run, which means that properties like end_time and elapsed_time are still unknown and will be unavailable to the run_status object.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性并非始终可用。例如，启动处理程序在厨师客户端运行的开始时运行，这意味着诸如 end_time 和 elapsed_time 之类的属性仍是未知的，并且对于 run_status 对象不可用。

trans-unit.source: These recipe helpers are available from the delivery-truck cookbook: https://github.com/opscode-cookbooks/delivery-truck. This cookbook is a recommended dependency for any build-cookbook for a project that publishes changes to a Chef Automate pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 这些食谱助手可从 delivery-truck 食谱中获取：https : //github.com/opscode-cookbooks/delivery-truck。对于将更改发布到Chef Automate管道的项目，该食谱是任何 build-cookbook 食谱的推荐依赖项。

trans-unit.target: 这些设置可以被添加到该 provisioner 的kitchen.yml文件的部分时的供应者是厨师零或厨师独奏。
